What you should Know.

Here are few things we thought might be of concern to you and we have provided some clarification below

The show is open to talented individuals across various age groups. Specific age requirements for different categories will be detailed in the application guidelines.

Applications will be accepted online through our official website. Details on the application process, required materials (like video submissions), and deadlines will be clearly provided.

Judges will assess participants on originality, technical skill, stage presence, creativity, storytelling ability, and overall entertainment value, ensuring a holistic evaluation of talent.

Winners receive a comprehensive prize package including cash, professional mentorship, recording contracts, film production opportunities, and extensive industry exposure to launch their careers.

No prior professional experience is strictly required. We are looking for raw talent and potential, providing a platform for individuals to develop their skills and make their mark.

All participants gain invaluable exposure, professional training, networking opportunities with industry experts, and a significant boost to their creative journey, regardless of winning.
